Package com.paymybuddy.ewallet.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.paymybuddy.ewallet.service.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object implements IUserService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO User before calling the repository.
Version:
1.0
Author:
SÃ©bastien Cappon

    User
    addUser(User user)
    A POST method that returns the User passed as parameter if his account is created or reactivated, and calls the CrudRepository save() method.

    A GET method that returns a Users whose id is passed as a parameter after calling the findById() derived query from repository.

    postUserByEmailAndPassword(UserLoginDto userLoginDto)
    A POST method that returns a User whose email and non-encrypted password are attributes of the UserLoginDto passed as parameter.

    An UPDATE method that calls the JPQL query updateActive() if the user whose id is passed as parameter exists.

  • Method Details

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(int userId)
      A GET method that returns a Users whose id is passed as a parameter after calling the findById() derived query from repository.
      Specified by:
      getUserById in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      A User OR null if he doesn't exist in the database.

    • postUserByEmailAndPassword

      public User postUserByEmailAndPassword(UserLoginDto userLoginDto) throws Exception
      A POST method that returns a User whose email and non-encrypted password are attributes of the UserLoginDto passed as parameter. It calls the findByEmail() derived query from repository.
      Specified by:
      postUserByEmailAndPassword in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      A User OR null if he doesn't exist in the database or if the password sent is wrong.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • addUser

      public User addUser(User user) throws Exception
      A POST method that returns the User passed as parameter if his account is created or reactivated, and calls the CrudRepository save() method.
      Specified by:
      addUser in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      A User OR null if his email is already in the database, and the account is always active.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Singularity :
      If the e-mail address of the user passed as parameter is already in the database AND if this User is no longer active, then, his account is reactivated with his new password.

    • updateProfile

      public Integer updateProfile(int userId, UserProfileDto userProfileDto) throws Exception
      An UPDATE method that checks informations passed as UserProfileDto parameter and calls then the JPQL query updateProfile() for the user whose id is passed as the first parameter.
      Specified by:
      updateProfile in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      An Integer OR null if the User doesn't exists in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • updateActive

      public Integer updateActive(int userId, boolean isActive) throws Exception
      An UPDATE method that calls the JPQL query updateActive() if the user whose id is passed as parameter exists.
      Specified by:
      updateActive in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      An Integer OR null if the User doesn't exists in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Singularity :
      If the active attribute goes false, the user bank account his credited with the residual value of the e-wallet. The e-wallet value is therefore reset to 0.

    • updateAmount

      public Integer updateAmount(int userId, double amount) throws Exception
      An UPDATE method that calls the JPQL query updateAmount() if the user whose id is passed as parameter exists.
      Specified by:
      updateAmount in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      An Integer OR null if the User doesn't exists in the database.
      Throws:
      Exception
      Singularity :
      This method is only called from service. It has no controller attached.
